name: Transactional Analysis Coaching Model
description: Transactional Analysis (TA) Coaching uses the Parent-Adult-Child (PAC) model to explore communication patterns, relationships, and personal growth. It helps clients build awareness of their default modes and develop healthier interactions.

current_ego_state.title: Which state are you in right now (Parent, Adult, Child)?
current_ego_state.description: Identify current ego state and its characteristics

communication_patterns.title: How do these states show up in your communication?
communication_patterns.description: Explore how different ego states manifest in communication

relationship_dynamics.title: What recurring dynamics occur in your relationships?

response_triggers.title: What triggers these responses?
response_triggers.description: Understand what triggers specific ego state responses

adult_state_impact.title: How does shifting into the Adult state change your interactions?
adult_state_impact.description: Explore the impact of operating from Adult ego state

awareness_choices.title: What choices open up with awareness?
awareness_choices.description: Identify new options that become available with increased awareness

alternative_responses.title: How can you respond differently in challenging situations?
alternative_responses.description: Develop new ways of responding to difficult situations

adult_strategies.title: What Adult-centered strategies can you use?
adult_strategies.description: Create specific strategies for maintaining Adult ego state

sustaining_awareness.title: What will you do to sustain Adult state awareness?
sustaining_awareness.description: Plan for maintaining ongoing awareness of ego states

progress_monitoring.title: How will you monitor progress?
progress_monitoring.description: Establish methods for tracking progress and development
